TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProfferServiceContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Enables clients to provide custom services to components on which the contract is implemented.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A component implements <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> to enable clients to offer services to the component. After a service has been offered to a component, other clients of the component can access the service. Components typically implement <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> on the same type on which they implement <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>.
Clients use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.ProfferService%2A> method to add an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> to the set of service providers offered by a component. Clients use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.RevokeService%2A> method to remove an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> from the set of service providers offered by a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProfferService(string serviceIdentifier, class System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract service) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that identifies the service being offered.
An that implements the service being offered.
Docs.summary: Adds a service to the set of services that can be accessed by clients of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The format of the `serviceIdentifier` parameter is defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> implementation. A uniform resource identifier (URI) is the recommended identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RevokeService(string serviceIdentifier) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that identifies the service being revoked.
Docs.summary: Removes a service from the set of services offered by a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The format of the `serviceIdentifier` parameter is defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> implementation. A uniform resource identifier (URI) is the recommended identifier.
